description: Ministry of Labour & Labour Relations - Revocation of Order Published in Gaz. Ex. No. 1709/49 of 10.06.2011 - Appointed Mr. S. Liyanage as arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mrs. M. Vaidayaratne & Mahawelia Authority - Appointed Mr. S. M. S. Jayawardana as arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. W. P. T. R. Silva and Colombo Communication (Pvt.) Ltd. - Appointed Mr. P. Weerasekara as Arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. R. D. Dhanapala and Cey. Electricity Board
